title: Why the Rodgers-LaFleur Connection Will Work
itunes:title: Why the Rodgers-LaFleur Connection Will Work
description:
Colin comments on Ezekiel Elliott still not showing up to Cowboys camp, why he feels the Packers will be fine this season, who he thinks will win the Steelers-Antonio Brown divorce, and why he thinks the Colts were probably booing Andrew Luck. Guests include Nick Wright, James Jones, Joel Klatt, and Sam Monson. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
